page.title: 15TOURISM.
page.content: {TOURISM}plays quite an important role in our area,which is a short distance from both the coast and Bodmin moor. Tourists travel from all over Great Britain,Europe,America and Canada to N.Cornwall in a variety of ways eg. car,bus,train,bicycle,hike etc. The main attractions locally are:- the beaches and all their amenities,the moors,scenic walks and drives,fishing, golf and,perhaps most important of all -tranquility. Farms take in guests for bed and breakfast and many are open all year.Small farm cottages and barns have been converted into holiday homes which are often only occupied for a few months of the year.The only hotel in our area also has a caravan and camping site. Most visitors stay for one or two weeks and often return to the same accomodation year after year.
